entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
